titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation and enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical, exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens and side-men of every parish within the diocess of Bath and VVells, at the triennial visitation of the Right Reverend Falther in God, Peter, Lord bishop of the said diocess
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Bath and Wells. Bishop (1672-1684 : Mews)
